card.name: Polaris
card.property: Electromagnetism Manipulation — Action: Search the top 6 cards of your deck for up to 2 [[magnetic]] cards and add them to your hand. Shuffle your deck. (Limit once per round.) “I am a big gun. Or have you forgotten?”

alternate.name: Lorna Dane
alternate.property: Geomagnetic Link — Action: Shuffle up to 2 [[magnetic]] cards from your discard pile into your deck. For each card shuffled this way, heal 1 damage from Lorna Dane. (Limit once per round.) “Complicated. It's my brand.”

card.name: Havok (Alex Summers)
card.property: Response: After Havok attacks, put each copy of Magnetized Debris in your discard pile on top of your deck (limit once per round). "... this is what I have been most afraid of, ever since I first manifested my powers - using it to kill."

card.property: Team-Up (Havok and Polaris). Max 1 per deck. Hero Response: After Havok deals any amount of damage, each player who controls Havok or Polaris may search their deck for an identity-specific card (up to 2 identity-specific cards instead if they control both) and add them to their hand.

card.name: The Fragmented Past
card.property: When Revealed: Discard each attached copy of Magnetized Debris. Forced Response: After you play a [[magnetic]] card, take 2 damage. Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Lorna Dane → remove The Fragmented Past from the game.
